examples: The Conservation Trust performs an instrumental role in the protection of rural environments.
El Conservation Trust desempeña un papel fundamental en la protección de los entornos rurales.
He was instrumental in bringing about an end to the conflict.
Jugó un papel decisivo para poner fin al conflicto.
They were highly instrumental in bringing the business to Newtown.
Fueron fundamentales para llevar el negocio a Newtown.
